author: olegk
msg: - Socket input stream now wrapped with a wrapper class that re-throws certain type of generic IO exceptions as HttpClient specific exceptions. In particular java.io.InterruptedIOExceptions are re-thrown as IOTimeoutException
- java.io.InterruptedIOExceptions in HttpConnection#open() re-thrown as ConnectTimeoutException
- HttpConnection#write(byte[], int, int) changed to throw IllegalArgumentException in case of invalid input. Used to throw HttpRecoverableException.

author: mbecke
msg: Sample code now points to the correct branch

author: mbecke
msg: Cookie doc updates to reflect new cookie code.

author: olegk
msg: PR #24352 (NLTM Proxy and basic host authorization)
Fixed the bug causing basic authentication via NLTM Proxy to fail
